name: meditate
effect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Meditates in a peaceful fashion to raise ATTACK.
flavor_text.emerald: Meditates in a peaceful fashion to raise ATTACK.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user meditates to awaken its power and raise its ATTACK stat.
